Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier obstruction at Cicero/Congress. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier obstruction at Cicero/Congress.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Pulaski/Congress to Forest Park in both directions and will conclude 05:00 a.m.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity at Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity at Roosevelt.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Red Line service to Howard

For service toward Howard, after stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, trains will then be diverted to the above-listed elevated stations, in the opposite order, through Armitage and then make all normal stops from Fullerton to Howard.

For service in areas away from where the Red Line is running

Consider using local bus alternatives through the area where you're traveling, including those to other train lines or where Red Line service has been rerouted to operate.

Shuttle buses are requested between Fullerton and State/Lake to provide connecting service in both directions.
